tooltip.ae2_overclocked.capacity_card: Increases internal slot stack limits for processing machines.
tooltip.ae2_overclocked.super_energy_car: Increases the machine's internal energy buffer capacity.
tooltip.ae2_overclocked.parallel_card: Processes recipes in parallel and can output overflow to the ME network.
message.ae2_overclocked.parallel_card_co: Another parallel card is already installed. Only one parallel card per machine is allowed.
message.ae2_overclocked.break_block_too_: Too many items inside the machine (> %s). Hold Shift while breaking to force removal.
